pageContext.claim: “How about signatures? They don't even want to have signatures verified. …They don't want to have signatures verified. Where are they sending them? Who are they sending them to? Who's sending them back? Who's sending them back?”
pageContext.analysis: This is totally false. No election officials, Democrat or Republican, were trying to end signature verification measures for mail ballots. In fact, more states had adopted signature verification and other safety measures for the 2020 election.
